ansible_deployment.Playbook¶

class ansible_deployment.Playbook(playbook_path, hosts, roles)¶

Represents an ansible playbook.

Parameters

  • playbook_path (Path) – Path object to playbook.

  • hosts (str) – Playbook target hosts. May be host name or group name.

  • roles (sequence) – Sequence of role objects.

path¶

Path to playbook.

Type

Path

name¶

Playbook name.

Type

str

hosts¶

Playbook target hosts.

Type

str

playbook_data¶

Rendered playbook from template.

Type

str

write()¶

Write playbook.
